verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hail, the morning star!
Who is rising in our heart,
Whose companion is the dawn,
And whose light is going on...
Going on!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are conquering!
O now death, where is your sting?
In the fragrance of their song,
Rise a people going on...
Going on!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We have found the place,
Where the Lord unveils our face,
Where the weakened heart's made strong
In the light of going on...
Going on!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We have overcome!
As we surround Thy throne,
In the morning light of praise
That fills all our days...
Going on!
